meta.site_title: B4OS 2025 - Free Bitcoin Training Program for Senior Developers | Bitcoin 4 Open Source
meta.site_description: Free technical training program for senior developers interested in the Bitcoin open source ecosystem in Latin America, the Caribbean, and Spain. Join B4OS 2025.
meta.keywords: Bitcoin FOSS, Lightning development, Bitcoin Latin America, Bitcoin Core, Bitcoin development, blockchain programming, Bitcoin open source, Bitcoin training, Bitcoin developers, Lightning Network, Bitcoin Latin America, Bitcoin Spain, Bitcoin Caribbean, Bitcoin residencies, Bitcoin mentoring
meta.author: Librer√≠a de Satoshi
meta.og_image_alt: B4OS - Technical training program in Bitcoin for senior developers
meta.twitter_image_alt: B4OS - Technical training program in Bitcoin

schema.organization_description: Free technical training program for senior developers interested in the Bitcoin open source ecosystem in Latin America, the Caribbean, and Spain
schema.offer_description: Free training program in Bitcoin and Lightning Network

hero.title_sub: Free technical Bitcoin training program for developers

objectives.title: B4OS offers specialized learning paths, allowing devs to focus on the areas of highest demand

potential.title: Awaken your potential
potential.description: Challenge yourself with our challenges and discover your hidden skills in the complex Bitcoin protocol. We'll guide you with courses and seminars so you can effectively contribute to Bitcoin and Lightning.

open_source.title: Open source and freedom
open_source.description: Learn to contribute to open source like the leaders of Linux, Google or the best Silicon Valley companies. Want to be part of the top 5% worldwide that writes 95% of open source code?

networking.title: Networking and community
networking.description: Bitcoin is a constantly growing industry that offers unique opportunities to interact with a global community of professionals and enthusiasts.

alumni.title: B4OS 2024 WAS A SUCCESS!
alumni.subtitle: Meet some of our most successful graduates who are now actively contributing to the Bitcoin ecosystem and FOSS projects

residencies.title: B4OS residencies
residencies.subtitle: B4OS offers specialized Bitcoin residencies for developers from Latin America, the Caribbean, and Spain. Unleash your full potential with B4OS: the best devs are selected to attend residencies with mentoring and master classes with expenses covered. To participate, it is essential to register and complete the programming challenges (PoW).

southamerica.title: South America
southamerica.description: Intensive program for senior developers from South American countries with specialized training in Bitcoin Core and Lightning Network.

europe.title: Europe
europe.description: Intensive residency in Europe, focused on networking and collaboration with the Spanish Bitcoin ecosystem.

centralamerica.title: Central America
centralamerica.description: Special program that includes paid full-time work in Central America.

northamerica1.title: North America I
northamerica1.description: Internship for developers at the Bitcoin House Guadalajara.

northamerica2.title: North America II
northamerica2.description: Exclusive for program grantees, focused on advanced projects and specialized mentoring.

residencies.disclaimer: * Dates may be subject to change. Selected participants will be notified in advance.

timeline.title: B4OS Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Learn about the important dates of the B4OS 2025‚Äì2026 program

registration.title: Registration
registration.description: Registration of participants for the B4OS 2025‚Äì2026 program.

challenges.title: B4OS Challenges
challenges.description: Let's see your programming level and Bitcoin knowledge. This stage is an asynchronous phase on Discord without classes or mentoring, but with community support.
challenges.highlight:
üèÜ The best developers move on to the next stage.
Rookie award: $300 USD for the best code from new developers who have never participated in B4OS, BOSS, or other programs.

guadalajara_selection.title: Guadalajara, Mexico selection
guadalajara_selection.description: Selection of 3 junior developers for the program in Guadalajara, Mexico.

division.title: Division into tracks
division.description: From October 15, 2025 to February 2026: portfolio building and FOSS contribution. Seminars, working groups, bitdevs, and meetups (5 months online).

southamerica_selection.title: South America residency selection
southamerica_selection.description: Evaluation based on Proof of Work in Open Source projects and course participation. Both routes merge and continue working on projects.
southamerica_selection.note: In exceptional cases, developers may also be selected in January.

residency.title: South America in-person residency
residency.description: 2-week immersive experience in Florian√≥polis, Brazil. Direct work with mentors and peers on high-impact projects.

grantees.title: Assignment of new grantees
grantees.description: Selection process and funding allocation for new program beneficiaries.

registration.title: Ready to join B4OS 2025?
registration.description: The B4OS 2025 program is open to senior developers from Latin America, the Caribbean, and Spain. The registration process is completely free.

requirements.title: Application requirements:
requirements.languages: Solid knowledge in languages such as C++, Rust, Python or JavaScript
requirements.interest: Genuine interest in contributing to the Bitcoin open source ecosystem

name.label: Name or pseudonym *
name.help: You can use your real name or a pseudonym

email.label: Email *
email.help: Double-check your email, we will use it to communicate with you

country.label: Country *
country.help: Select the country where you currently reside

dev_language.label: Development language you program best in *
dev_language.help: Select the language where you feel most productive

technologies.label: Other languages and technologies you master *
technologies.help: Indicate what other languages and technologies you master

github.label: GitHub / Portfolio *
github.help: Share your GitHub profile or portfolio

motivation.label: What interests you about the Bitcoin ecosystem and "freedom tech" technologies? *
motivation.help: We're interested in knowing what specific aspects of the Bitcoin ecosystem you're passionate about (Privacy, Security, Censorship resistance, Decentralization, etc.).

how_heard.label: How did you hear about B4OS? *
how_heard.help: Tell us how you heard about us or through which channel you found us

terms.label: I accept the program's terms and conditions
terms.help: You must accept the terms to continue

partnerships.title: Alliances
partnerships.subtitle: Bitcoin for Open Source would not be possible without the support of our allies.

main_sponsor.text: This program exists thanks to the invaluable support of

partner_descriptions.chaincode: R&D lab focused on Bitcoin Core and Lightning.
